DashboardProfilePage.Incoming: Welcome, this is your first entry to egestion! We need some information for you to enjoy the website to the fullest.
DashboardProfilePage.FirstSurname-Required: Surname is required, to contain at least 3 characters.
DashboardProfilePage.Address-Need: We need your address, thank you!
DashboardProfilePage.Mobile-Need: We need your mobile number so we can keep in touch, thank you!
DashboardProfilePage.Change-Photo: Profile picture successfully uploaded!. Please press "Update your profile" to save changes
DashboardProfilePage.Types-File: You need jpeg, jpg or png files to change your profile picture.

DashboardSuperAdminPage.Info-Page: SuperAdmin administration window, here you can add new organisations and list existing organisations in the system.
DashboardSuperAdminPage.Name: Organization Name
DashboardSuperAdminPage.Advise: Only the President can change the following roles:

DashboardOrgProfilePage.Info: SuperAdmin administration window, here you can add, change or update the data of the selected organisation.
DashboardOrgProfilePage.Info-President: President administration window, here you can add, change or update the data of your organisation.
DashboardOrgProfilePage.Save-Error: Error saving the organization, plese retry

PresidentProfilePage.Info: President administration window, from here you can assign the roles of Treasurer, Secretary or assign a new President.

VerifyMailPage.Info: If you want to enter the dark side of this website... you have to check your email, we are waiting for you!

TreasurerResumePage.Info: Window to display the expenditure / income summary for the Treasurer.

TreasurerIncomePage.Info: Treasurer's window, to show the summary of finances.
TreasurerIncomePage.Table-Title: Fees paid by users in the year:

TreasurerIncomeRegisterPage.Info: Treasurer's window to add income and payment details of a member.
TreasurerIncomeRegisterPage.Description-Sms: Add a comment, reminder or associated message (if desired ;-) ). This clarification will go in the automatically generated mail to inform the user.
TreasurerIncomeRegisterPage.ErrorAmount: The amount to pay must be a number and not empty.
TreasurerIncomeRegisterPage.ErrorAmountExceeded: The amount to be recorded cannot be greater than the balance due.
TreasurerIncomeRegisterPage.SaveFail: There was a fail during the saving process. Please try again.
TreasurerIncomeRegisterPage.Not-Quota: There is no default quota for the year, one must be created in order to be allocated to the members of the organisation.

TreasurerExpenseRegisterPage.Info: Treasurer's window for recording expenditure data.

TreasurerExpensePage.Info: Treasurer's window, to show the summary of expenses.

SecretaryResumePage.Info: Secretary window, to show the summary of users and their status.
SecretaryResumePage.Name: Name

SecretaryMeetingsPage.Info: Secretary's window, to show the summary of the meetings held.

DisabledUserPage.Info: The account has been successfully created, but has not yet been associated with any organisation. An administrator will complete this process.

TreasurerSetQuotaPage.SubTitle: Working in the Organisation
